BTW here I've done some write-up which claims to come up with the theoretically most efficient pubsub algorithm: https://hackmd.io/Cnh8tkPmSUW9GmZj0YvUVw
It abstracts away from practical application but may give some intuitions why it's better to split the message to smallest parts possible and why (as you described) it's effective to send distinct parts (columns) to distinct nodes
